name: Super Terrible Project
storyline: You're homeless drunk Mario, dude. It's a ROM hack. It doesn't go that deep.
summary: Super Terrible Project is a Super Mario Bros. ROM hack, complete with eight worlds, full of 35 original levels. Explore a weird purple landscape, avoiding all of the scattered, evil enemies, and try not to die. Try to avoid tricky level design on just three lives, and be careful to stock up on more! Can you get to the end of the game and save the princess?
